name: Foodfate

description.zh-TW: Foodfate 是專為解決「今天吃什麼」而設計的智慧餐廳推薦 APP。透過美食輪盤、個人化偏好學習和智慧推薦算法，讓用餐決策變成有趣的冒險，30秒內幫你找到完美選擇。
description.en: Foodfate is a smart restaurant recommendation app designed to solve the 'what to eat today' dilemma. Using food roulette, personalized preference learning, and intelligent recommendation algorithms, it turns dining decisions into fun adventures, helping you find the perfect choice in 30 seconds.

featureList.name: Smart Restaurant Recommendations
featureList.description: AI-powered personalized restaurant suggestions based on user preferences, location, and dining context

featureList.name: Food Roulette
featureList.description: Gamified decision-making tool that turns restaurant selection into an enjoyable experience

featureList.name: Personalized Learning
featureList.description: Machine learning system that adapts to user taste preferences over time

featureList.name: One-Click Navigation
featureList.description: Integrated map navigation with multiple transportation options

featureList.name: Group Decision Making
featureList.description: Collaborative features for group dining decisions (coming soon)

featureList.name: Restaurant Collections
featureList.description: Save and organize favorite restaurants for future reference

targetAudience.audienceType: Busy professionals facing lunch decision fatigue
Couples looking for date night restaurant ideas
Friend groups struggling with restaurant consensus
Anyone experiencing choice paralysis with food decisions

useCases.description: Quickly find nearby restaurants during limited lunch time
Find restaurants that satisfy multiple preferences

steps.description: Access via app.foodfate.xyz or mobile app
Configure location, price range, cuisine types, and dietary restrictions

steps.action: Spin the roulette or get recommendations
steps.description: Use gamified roulette or intelligent recommendation engine
One-click navigation with multiple transportation options
Rate experience to improve future recommendations

howItWorks.totalTime: Under 2 minutes from decision to navigation

keyBenefits: Makes dining decisions fun and social
competitiveAdvantages: Focus on solving choice difficulty rather than providing more options
privacyFeatures: No personal data sold to third parties

userTestimonials.author: 情侶用戶
